mapper.select: SELECT uuid, model_name AS modelName, battery, latitude, longitude FROM drone
SELECT uuid, battery, model_name AS modelName, is_message AS isMsg, loc, latitude, longitude, create_at AS createAt FROM drone WHERE uuid = #{uuid}
SELECT dd.driving_no AS drivingNo, dd.start_at AS startAt, dd.end_at AS endAt FROM drone AS d INNER JOIN drone_driving AS dd ON d.uuid = dd.uuid WHERE d.uuid = #{uuid}

SELECT ddh.history_no AS historyNo, ddh.latitude, ddh.longitude, ddh.create_at AS createAt FROM drone_driving AS dd INNER JOIN drone_driving_history AS ddh ON dd.driving_no = ddh.driving_no WHERE dd.driving_no = #{drivingNo};
